title: Britecharts
description: Main contributor of the client-side reusable Charting Library based on D3.js v5 that offers easy and intuitive use of charts and components that can be composed together to create amazing visualizations.

title: dalerasrorov.com
description: I built my personal website with Gatsby using React and TypeScript. Set up a custom infrastructure of the website for maintainable and enjoyable development.

title: Componofy
description: A web app that will help you combine personal and public Spotify playlists into a new one or merge with existing playlist.

title: syncloud-queue
description: Quickly create a real-time playlist from SoundCloud and set it to autoplay.

title: Britecharts React
description: A React wrapper for the Britecharts charting library. It allows the use of Britecharts charts and modules in a React ecosystem.
